#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
  int t,n,*a,i,count;
  cin>>t;
 while(t--)
  {
      cin>>n;
      a=new int[n+1];
    for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
      cin>>a[i];

    count=1;
    for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
      while(a[i]>=i)
       {
        a[i]-=i;
        count++;
         }
      }

     if(count%2)
     cout<<"BOB\n";
     else
     cout<<"ALICE\n";
}
}
